name: DarkGame
summary: A police detective races to save the captives of a dark web game show, where the losers are executed via live broadcast. For the sadistic masked host, this is all part of his master plan to gain ratings.

name: Society of the Snow
summary: In 1972, the Uruguayan Air Force Flight 571, chartered to fly a rugby team to Chile, catastrophically crashes on a glacier in the heart of the Andes. Only 29 of the 45 passengers survived the crash and finding themselves in one of the world’s toughest environments, they are forced to resort to extreme measures to stay alive.

name: He Went That Way
summary: Set in 1964, He Went That Way is a taut thriller based on a true crime story that puts a wicked spin on the buddy road trip film.

name: Memory [2023]
summary: Sylvia is a social worker who leads a simple and structured life. This is blown open when Saul follows her home from their high school reunion. Their surprise encounter will profoundly impact both of them as they open the door to the past.

name: Night Swim
summary: Wyatt Russell stars as a former baseball player who hopes to use his family's new swimming pool to rehab and return to playing. However the home's dark past is about to unleash a malevolent force upon the family.

name: Race for Glory: Audi vs Lancia
summary: Daniel Brühl and Riccardo Scamarcio star in a true David vs. Goliath story spotlighting the intense rivalry between Germany (Audi) and Italy (Lancia) at the 1983 Rally World Championships.

name: The Bricklayer
summary: The Bricklayer follows a rogue insurgent blackmailing the CIA by assassinating foreign journalists and making it appear the agency is responsible. As other nations begin turning against the U.S., the CIA must lure Steve Vail (Aaron Eckhart) – their most brilliant and rebellious operative – out of retirement.

name: Justice League: Crisis on Infinite Earths, Part One
summary: Based on DC's iconic comic book limited series ‘Crisis on Infinite Earths' by Marv Wolfman and George Pérez, join DC Super Heroes from across the multiverse in the first of three parts of DC's new animated film Justice League: Crisis on Infinite Earths – Part One, which marks the beginning of the end to the Tomorrowverse story arc.

name: They Turned Us Into Killers
summary: After her best friend's suicide, Star sets out for revenge against the man who she feels is ultimately responsible for her death.

name: War Blade
summary: A WW2 adventure film from the multi-award-winning director, Nicholas Winter.

name: Destroy All Neighbors
summary: William Brown (Jonah Ray Rodrigues), a neurotic, self-absorbed musician determined to finish his prog-rock magnum opus, faces a creative roadblock in the form of a noisy and grotesque neighbor named Vlad (Alex Winter). Finally working up the nerve to demand that Vlad keep it down, William inadvertently decapitates him.

name: He Went That Way
summary: Set in 1964, He Went That Way is a taut thriller based on a true crime story that puts a wicked spin on the buddy road trip film.

name: Mean Girls
summary: Teenager Cady Heron (Angourie Rice) tries to fit in at high school and makes the mistake of falling for the Queen Bee Regina George's ex-boyfriend, Aaron.

name: Role Play
summary: Emma has a wonderful husband and two kids in the suburbs of New Jersey - she also has a secret life as an assassin for hire, a secret that her husband David discovers when the couple decide to spice up their marriage with a little role play.

name: Self Reliance
summary: A middle-aged man is invited into a dangerous dark web reality TV show where assassins try to kill him.

name: The Beekeeper
summary: In The Beekeeper, one man's brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after he is revealed to be a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as "Beekeepers."

name: The Book of Clarence
summary: Inspired by classic Hollywood epics set in biblical times, The Book of Clarence tells the tale of Clarence, a down-on-his-luck denizen of Jerusalem embarking on a misguided attempt to capitalize on the rise of celebrity and influence of the Messiah for his own personal gain - a journey that leads him on an exploration of the idea of faith and to a highly unexpected path of his own.

name: Craig Before the Creek
summary: Discover the origin story of the Creek's greatest explorer trio - Craig, JP, and Kelsey - and in a way we’ve never seen them before.

name: Punch [2024]
summary: A young girl celebrating her last night out in her hometown is stalked by a mysterious killer in a Mr Punch mask.

name: Spring Lakes
summary: When Marcus, a down and out struggling filmmaker goes on a search for his missing sister in Spring Lakes, he encounters strange and mysterious occurrences in the form of a Satanic Cult. Marcus must find his sister before, he too, becomes engulfed by the living forest and suffers the same fate as his sister, Shiela.

name: Queen Rock Montreal in IMAX
summary: Experience rock & roll royalty with Freddie Mercury, Brian May, Roger Taylor, and John Deacon as they take to the stage in an historic and exhilarating live concert from 1981.

name: I.S.S.
summary: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station as a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Reeling, the US and Russian astronauts aboard each receive orders from the ground; take control of the station by any means necessary.

name: Cult Killer
summary: A PI (Antonio Banderas) and his partner (Alice Eve) are drawn into a web of intrigue when they start tracking a serial killer targeting a wealthy family with a dark secret.

name: Founders Day
summary: A series of ominous murders rocks a small town just days before a heated mayoral election. As accusations fly and the threat of a masked killer darkens every corner, residents must race against time to uncover the truth.

name: Origin
summary: While grappling with tremendous personal tragedy, Isabel sets herself on a path of global investigation and discovery.

name: The Kitchen [2023]
summary: Financially strapped Izi decides to take part in a heist in order to pay for his son's hospital bills.

name: Wanted Man
summary: Dolph Lundgren stars as an aging detective who is sent to extradite a female witness, but they encounter people on both sides of the border who are gunning for him and his witness.

name: Which Brings Me to You
summary: Two romantic burnouts, Jane and Will, are immediately drawn to each other at a mutual friend’s wedding. After a disastrous hookup in the coatroom, the two spend the next 24 hours together, trading candid confessions of messy histories and heartbreak.

name: The Moogai
summary: Sarah and Fergus, a hopeful young Aboriginal couple, give birth to their second baby. But what should be a joyous time of their lives becomes sinister when Sarah starts seeing a malevolent spirit she is convinced is trying to take her baby.

name: A Nanny's Revenge
summary: When a loving couple with two children welcome a seemingly sweet and capable nanny into their home, little do they know that her presence will unravel a chilling tale of hidden agendas and sinister secrets, plunging them into a terrifying journey.

name: Justice League: Crisis on Infinite Earths, Part One
summary: Based on DC's iconic comic book limited series ‘Crisis on Infinite Earths' by Marv Wolfman and George Pérez, join DC Super Heroes from across the multiverse in the first of three parts of DC's new animated film Justice League: Crisis on Infinite Earths – Part One, which marks the beginning of the end to the Tomorrowverse story arc.

name: American Star
summary: Starring Ian McShane, this film follows an assassin on his final assignment in Fuerteventura who decides to stay on the island while his target is delayed in arriving. He becomes drawn to the people he meets and a ghostly shipwreck which complicates his mission greatly when the target returns.

name: Cold Copy
summary: Cold Copy tells the story of two driven women pushing the boundaries of journalistic integrity for the sake of delivering a compelling, and ultimately scandalous, exposé.

name: Housekeeping For Beginners
summary: Dita, who, despite never aspiring to be a mother, finds herself compelled to raise her girlfriend's two daughters - Mia, a tiny troublemaker, and Vanesa, a rebellious teenager.

name: Miller's Girl
summary: A talented young writer (Jenna Ortega) embarks on a creative odyssey when her teacher (Martin Freeman) assigns a project that entangles them both in an increasingly complex web.

name: Sometimes I Think About Dying
summary: Lost on the dreary Oregon coast, Fran finds solace in her cubicle, listening to the constant hum of officemates and occasionally daydreaming to pass the time. She is ghosting through life, unable to pop her bubble of isolation, when a friendly new coworker, Robert, persistently tries to connect with her. Though it goes against every fiber of her being, she may have to give this guy a chance. Director Rachel Lambert and team craft beautiful cinema for this delicately told story of love for the socially awkward and emotionally challenged. The film is made all the more human by its lovely cast, most prominent in the penetrating eyes of lead actress/producer, Daisy Ridley, and the caring smile of lead actor, Dave Merheje. Sometimes I Think About Dying is an unexpected fable on the virtues of living.

name: The Seeding
summary: A hiker lost in the desert takes refuge with a woman living alone and soon discovers that she might not be there willingly.

name: The Underdoggs
summary: Based on a pitch from Snoop Dogg and Schwartz-Morini comes this comedy about a former NFL star player, who after a run-in with the law, agrees to take over as coach of a youth football team.

name: A Hero's Journey: The Making Of Percy Jackson And The Olympians
summary: A Hero’s Journey: The Making of Percy Jackson and the Olympians is a 50-minute documentary which gives viewers a behind-the-scenes look at the TV series Percy Jackson and the Olympians.

name: Gacy: Serial Killer Next Door
summary: A teenager's life in a quiet suburb changes drastically when John Wayne Gacy, a famed serial killer, becomes his neighbor. His curiosity leads to dark secrets and a frightening journey from innocence to a dire clash with evil.

name: There Is a Monster
summary: A successful photographer is haunted by a monster that only he can see.

name: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel Foley
summary: Detective Axel Foley (Eddie Murphy) is back on the beat in Beverly Hills. After his daughter’s life is threatened, she (Taylour Paige) and Foley team up with a new partner (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) and old pals Billy Rosewood (Judge Reinhold) and John Taggart (John Ashton) to turn up the heat and uncover a conspiracy.

name: Legend of the White Dragon
summary: In the Aftermath, the city was left decimated. A past reminder of the great battle and fall of heroes. The heroes were blamed, stripped of their titles, and hunted.

name: Mars Express
summary: In 2200, private detective Aline Ruby and her android partner Carlos Rivera are hired by a wealthy businessman to track down a notorious hacker.

name: Salem's Lot [Remake]
summary: Author Ben Mears returns to his hometown for inspiration, only to discover the town is being preyed upon by a bloodthirsty vampire.

name: The Concierge
summary: Akino is a trainee concierge at the Hokkyoku Department Store, an unusual department store that caters exclusively to animals. Under the watchful eyes of the floor manager and senior concierges, Akino runs around to fulfill the wishes of customers with a myriad of needs and problems in her pursuit to become a full-fledged concierge.

name: The Witcher: Sirens of the Deep
summary: This is the second animated movie based on The Witcher, Polish author Andrzej Sapkowski's fantasy book series which inspired a blockbuster video game franchise and the Netflix series.

name: This is Spinal Tap 2
summary: Could this one go past 11? The band will crank it up in this 40th anniversary sequel to the critically-acclaimed and much-adored 1984 mockumentary This Is Spinal Tap.

name: Wallace & Gromit 2
summary: Wallace's newest invention threatens the safety and well being of everyone around him.

name: Argylle
summary: Matthew Vaughn's spy thriller Argylle features an ensemble cast that includes Henry Cavill, Bryce Dallas Howard, Sam Rockwell, Bryan Cranston, Catherine O’Hara, Dua Lipa and Ariana DeBose with John Cena and Samuel L. Jackson.

name: Calamity Jane
summary: After Wild Bill (Stephen Amell) is killed in a poker game, Calamity Jane (Emily Bett Rickards) must break out of prison and seek revenge before the Deadwood's Sheriff (Tim Rozon) can arrest them.

name: Departing Seniors
summary: After being bullied, Javier begins experiencing visions that allow him to see the future. With this knowledge, Javier, tries to save his schoolmates from a shocking murder that's about to take place.

name: Orion and the Dark
summary: Based on the book by Emma Yarlett and written by Charlie Kaufman, DreamWorks Animation's Orion and the Dark tells a story about looking what scares you in the eye - and realizing it may not be that frightening after all.

name: Scrambled
summary: A quintessential eternal bridesmaid finds herself between weddings and bad dates and decides to freeze her eggs and go on a journey of self-discovery.

name: She Is Conann
summary: In a barbaric fantasy sci-fi trip through time, sword-and-sorcery mythology is bent, fractured, and gender-swapped by master visionary Bertrand Mandico in his third feature epic.

name: The Monk and The Gun
summary: The Monk and The Gun is a story centered around one of the world's youngest democracies being Bhutan.

name: The Tiger's Apprentice
summary: Following the death of his grandmother a young boy learns comes from a line of magical Guardians.

name: Box: Metaphor
summary: Box: Metaphor is a compelling dystopian journey where unjust imprisonment unveils societal conformity and defiance's profound impact. It's about breaking free from metaphorical boxes and the resilience of the human spirit.

name: Gods of the Deep
summary: When a daring mission leads a deep sea submarine team into a mysterious opening on the ocean floor, they uncover a lost underwater world and awaken its ancient race of otherworldly beings.

name: Lisa Frankenstein
summary: A coming of RAGE love story from acclaimed writer Diablo Cody about a misunderstood teenager and her high school crush, who happens to be a handsome corpse. After a set of playfully horrific circumstances bring him back to life, the two embark on a murderous journey to find love, happiness… and a few missing body parts along the way.

name: Lola [2024]
summary: Set in 2002 Middle America, Lola revolves around nineteen-year-old Lola James (Nicola Peltz Beckham) who is desperately working to save enough money to get her little brother, Arlo (Luke David Blumm), out of their toxic home dominated by their mother.

name: Out of Darkness
summary: A small group of Stone Age people reach the shores of a desolate landscape only find they may not be alone after all.

name: The Private Eye
summary: Matt Rife stars as a private investigator who falls for a mysterious woman who hires him to spy on a man.

name: Upgraded
summary: An ambitious intern gets upgraded to first class on a work trip where she meets a handsome gentleman, who mistakes her for her boss - a white lie that sets off a wild chain of events.

name: Willie and Me
summary: Eva Hassmann plays a housewife who goes on an epic journey to see Willie Nelson's farewell concert.

name: Cellphone
summary: Wynne, who is grieving the death of her fiancé, starts seeing disturbing images on her cell phone about her future. If she doesn't figure them out in time, she will die.

name: Earworm
summary: Henry Adams, a socially awkward man seeking help for his condition accepts an invitation to a self help group that is more than it seems. Danger is around every corner as Henry goes deeper into the treatment.

name: Fortunes of War
summary: British commandos, isolated after a failed Normandy raid, face grim odds until an unexpected find offers an escape opportunity.

name: Bob Marley: One Love
summary: Bob Marley: One Love celebrates the life and music of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love and unity.

name: Madame Web
summary: Madame Web stars Dakota Johnson as Cassandra Webb, a paramedic in Manhattan who may have clairvoyant abilities.

name: Stranger in the Woods
summary: Stranger In The Woods is about a woman who goes on a weekend getaway trip to the woods with her friends in hopes to recover from a traumatic event. But when her dog vanishes, their sanity unravels, leading to a chilling fight for survival.

name: Altered Reality
summary: Prepare to immerse yourself in a world where reality bends, secrets lurk in the shadows, and the line between good and evil blurs.

name: Bleeding Love
summary: Starring real-life father and daughter Ewan and Clara McGregor, Bleeding Love is a gritty, emotional tale about healing familial wounds through re-connection.

name: God and Country: The Rise of Christian Nationalism
summary: God & Country looks at the implications of Christian Nationalism and how it distorts not only our constitutional republic but Christianity itself.

name: Land of Bad
summary: Russell Crowe and Liam Hemsworth star in this action flick about an Air Force drone pilot assisting a Delta Force special ops mission in the Philippines.

name: Lights Out [2024]
summary: In Lights Out, a homeless veteran, Michael "Duffy" Duffield (Frank Grillo), meets a talkative Ex-Con, Max Bomer (Mekhi Phifer) who notices Duffy's skills after he gets into a bar fight and offers him a well-paying "job" competing in underground fight clubs.

name: Monolith
summary: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. But as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, she is left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

name: Snoopy Presents: Welcome Home, Franklin
summary: The origin story for one of Peanuts' most beloved characters, the special follows Franklin as he moves to a new town and navigates new friendships.

name: The Hobby
summary: This documentary is a character-driven feel good deep dive into the high-stakes, eccentric world of card collecting, following buyers, sellers, card shop owners, graders, online streamers, auctioneers, and more, who all participate in the hobby in their own unique ways.

name: The Omicron Killer
summary: Attacked by vicious thugs, left severely wounded and hospitalized, a serial killer known as The Omicron Killer vows vengeance as he embarks on a new reign of terror!

name: Butchers Book Two: Raghorn
summary: In "Butchers Book Two: Raghorn," the Butchers story continues when a car accident leaves the captors in the hands of brutal cannibals who plan to hack them up for meat.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - To the Hashira Training
summary: To the Hashira Training will show Episode 11 from the Swordsmith Village Arc, featuring the conclusion to the fierce battle between Tanjiro and Upper Four, Hantengu, and Nezuko's triumph over the sun. It's followed by Episode 1 of the Hashira Training Arc, featuring the beginning of the training conducted by the Hashira in preparation for the forthcoming final battle against Muzan Kibutsuji.

name: Drive-Away Dolls
summary: From director Ethan Coen comes this road comedy about two friends who embark on a road trip to loosen up and have some fun.

name: Hideo Kojima: Connecting Worlds
summary: Hideo Kojima: Connecting Worlds explores the power and potential of video games as an art form through the work of an influential talent.

name: Ordinary Angels
summary: The incredible true story of a hairdresser who rallies an entire community to help a widowed father's daughter.

name: Parallel
summary: Parallel follows the story of Vanessa (Danielle Deadwyler) who takes refuge at her family’s lake house to grieve after suffering the loss of her child.

name: Stopmotion
summary: A stop-motion animator struggles to control her demons after the loss of her overbearing mother.

name: The Invisible Fight
summary: After watching his team of guards get decimated by Chinese kung fu warriors, young Rafael seeks martial arts training from a monk.

name: The Promised Land
summary: The story of Ludvig Kahlen who pursued his lifelong dream: to make the Danish heath bring him wealth and honor.

name: Frankenstein Legacy
summary: William's search for his father's stolen body unveils horrors at home as his mother descends into madness, driven by Frankenstein's journals.

name: Parallel
summary: Parallel follows the story of Vanessa (Danielle Deadwyler) who takes refuge at her family’s lake house to grieve after suffering the loss of her child.

name: Runaway Radio
summary: Acclaimed musicians such as Lyle Lovett, ZZ Top’s Dusty Hill, Melissa Etheridge and Sammy Hagar along with top radio DJs from across the US reflect on how the medium changed their lives and the lives of devoted listeners.

name: The Greatest Love Story Never Told
summary: Directed by Jason Bergh, The Greatest Love Story Never Told follows Jennifer Lopez as she attempts her most daring project yet: independently producing a new album and cinematic original that explore her twenty-year journey to self-love.

name: Code 8: Part II
summary: A teenage girl fights to get justice for her murdered brother at the hands of corrupt police officers.

name: Butchers Book Two: Raghorn
summary: In "Butchers Book Two: Raghorn," the Butchers story continues when a car accident leaves the captors in the hands of brutal cannibals who plan to hack them up for meat.

name: Kids Are Growing Up: A Story About a Kid Named Laroi
summary: An intimate story of Charlton "The Kid LAROI" Howard who went from an unknown musician living in Australia to a teenage global superstar selling out his hometown arena in three years.

name: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel Foley
summary: Detective Axel Foley (Eddie Murphy) is back on the beat in Beverly Hills. After his daughter’s life is threatened, she (Taylour Paige) and Foley team up with a new partner (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) and old pals Billy Rosewood (Judge Reinhold) and John Taggart (John Ashton) to turn up the heat and uncover a conspiracy.

name: Legend of the White Dragon
summary: In the Aftermath, the city was left decimated. A past reminder of the great battle and fall of heroes. The heroes were blamed, stripped of their titles, and hunted.

name: Mars Express
summary: In 2200, private detective Aline Ruby and her android partner Carlos Rivera are hired by a wealthy businessman to track down a notorious hacker.

name: Salem's Lot [Remake]
summary: Author Ben Mears returns to his hometown for inspiration, only to discover the town is being preyed upon by a bloodthirsty vampire.

name: The Concierge
summary: Akino is a trainee concierge at the Hokkyoku Department Store, an unusual department store that caters exclusively to animals. Under the watchful eyes of the floor manager and senior concierges, Akino runs around to fulfill the wishes of customers with a myriad of needs and problems in her pursuit to become a full-fledged concierge.

name: The Witcher: Sirens of the Deep
summary: This is the second animated movie based on The Witcher, Polish author Andrzej Sapkowski's fantasy book series which inspired a blockbuster video game franchise and the Netflix series.

name: This is Spinal Tap 2
summary: Could this one go past 11? The band will crank it up in this 40th anniversary sequel to the critically-acclaimed and much-adored 1984 mockumentary This Is Spinal Tap.

name: Wallace & Gromit 2
summary: Wallace's newest invention threatens the safety and well being of everyone around him.

name: Amelia's Children
summary: Edward's search for his biological family takes him on a terrifying journey to Portugal.

name: Asleep in My Palm
summary: Asleep in My Palm explores the nature of parenthood and class in America as a father and daughter live off the grid in rural Ohio near a small liberal arts college.

name: Dune, Part Two
summary: Dune: Part Two explores the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

name: Megamind vs. The Doom Syndicate
summary: Megamind's former villain team, The Doom Syndicate, has returned. Our newly crowned blue hero must now keep up evil appearances until he can assemble his friends (Roxanne, Ol' Chum, and Keiko) to stop his former evil teammates from launching Metro City to the moon.

name: Outlaw Posse
summary: Chief (Mario Van Peebles) returns from years of hiding in Mexico to claim stolen gold hidden in the hills of Montana. In his quest, he reunites an ensemble of fresh & familiar faces - together they fight off Angel, whose rationale to the gold leaves a trail of deception and dead bodies.

name: Problemista
summary: Alejandro takes a job with an erratic art-world outcast in hopes of staying in the country after his work visa runs out.

name: Ridley Scott's Napoleon
summary: Director Ridley Scott helms the chair in this drama about French military leader Napoleon (played by Joaquin Phoenix).

name: Silver Haze
summary: Fifteen years after surviving a traumatic fire, 23-year-old nurse Franky tries to cope with her anger and thirst for revenge.

name: Spaceman
summary: Adam Sandler stars in this sci-fi drama about an astronaut adrift in the cosmos. Six months into a solo mission, a lonely astronaut confronts the cracks in his marriage with help from a mysterious creature he discovers on his ship.

name: Cover Your Ears
summary: From poignant protest songs to fluffy Top 40 hits, music has always defined our culture. With such a powerful influence on all aspects of society, the messages and themes portrayed by musicians have long been considered dangerous to some.

name: Ricky Stanicky
summary: Three friends invent a character to use to get out of tricky predicaments, but they have to hire an actor to portray their fictional friend when their significant others become suspicious.

name: 5lbs of Pressure
summary: Adam (Luke Evans), an ex-con back in his old neighborhood after serving a 16-year stretch for murder, walks a rocky path of forgiveness toward the son who grew up without him, while the bitter, volatile brother of the youth he killed looms in the background.

name: Accidental Texan
summary: Fresh-faced recent Harvard student Erwin (Rudy Pankow) flames out of his first professional acting job when he forgets to turn off his phone and triggers an explosive nightmare on set. His career and cell phone in tatters, he flees the New Orleans set, only to have his car break down deep in the heart of Texas oil country.

name: American Dreamer [2024]
summary: A twice-divorced, underpaid professor (Peter Dinklage) strikes a deal for a home only to learn the American dream may not quite be what it used to be.

name: Damsel
summary: Damsel sees Millie Bobby Brown as a damsel who is out for revenge against a handsome prince who wronged her.

name: Imaginary
summary: When Jessica (DeWanda Wise) moves back into her childhood home with her family, her youngest stepdaughter Alice (Pyper Braun) develops an eerie attachment to a stuffed bear named Chauncey she finds in the basement. Alice starts playing games with Chauncey that begin playful and become increasingly sinister.

name: Kung Fu Panda 4
summary: After three death-defying adventures defeating world-class villains with his unmatched courage and mad martial arts skills, Po, the Dragon Warrior (Jack Black), is called upon by destiny to... give it a rest already. More specifically, he’s tapped to become the Spiritual Leader of the Valley of Peace.

name: Night Shift
summary: While working her first night shift at a remote motel, a young woman, Gwen Taylor (Phoebe Tonkin), begins to suspect that she is being followed by a dangerous character from her past.

name: The Piper
summary: When a composer must finish her late mentor's concerto, she discovers that playing its music summons deadly consequences.

name: The Princess Warrior
summary: Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve a stolen, sacred text and restore peace to their homeland.

name: Jonah
summary: After an alleged alien abduction of Margot’s son Jonah, Ozzie and Darren, journalists investigating supernatural cases, are determined to expose the truth. During their investigation, Ozzie grapples with his own haunting memories, leading to intense skepticism about Margot’s story.

name: One-Percent Warrior
summary: After his devastatingly fast, samurai-style combat approach sets filmmakers against him, a legendary action star (Tak Sakaguchi) films his own movie - on turf claimed by feuding yakuza gangs, including Japan's deadliest martial arts assassin.

name: Silver Haze
summary: Fifteen years after surviving a traumatic fire, 23-year-old nurse Franky tries to cope with her anger and thirst for revenge.

name: The Lionheart
summary: The Lionheart is a documentary about racing driver Dan Wheldon and his family.

name: The Shamrock Spitfire
summary: The Shamrock Spitfire chronicles the epic true story of Brendan "Paddy" Finucane, one of the most celebrated fighter pilots of World War II and the youngest Wing Commander in history.

name: The Woods Are Real
summary: A wealthy Brooklyn couple accepts a friend's invitation to an off-grid cabin only to have their lives forever changed.

name: FRIDA [2024]
summary: An intimately raw and magical journey through the life, mind, and heart of iconic artist Frida Kahlo, FRIDA is told through her own words for the very first time, drawn from her famed illustrated diary, revealing letters, essays, and candid print interviews — and brought vividly to life by lyrical animation inspired by her unforgettable artwork.

name: Arthur the King
summary: Over the course of ten days and 435 miles, an unbreakable bond is forged between pro adventure racer Michael Light (Mark Wahlberg) and a scrappy street dog companion dubbed Arthur.

name: Escape [2023]
summary: Best friends Carla and Tamsin, embark on a serene island vacation seeking relaxation and adventure only to kidnapped.

name: Invader
summary: A young woman arrives in the Chicago suburbs and begins to suspect that something terrible has happened to her missing cousin, but soon realizes that her greatest fears don't even begin to scratch the surface.

name: Irish Wish
summary: When the love of her life gets engaged to her best-friend, Maddie (Lindsay Lohan) puts her feelings aside to be a bridesmaid at their wedding in Ireland. Until a spontaneous wish for true love causes her to wake up as the bride-to-be.

name: Knox Goes Away
summary: Michael Keaton plays a contract killer who is trying to redeem himself in his final days by saving his son's life.

name: Love Lies Bleeding
summary: From Director Rose Glass comes an electric new love story; reclusive gym manager Lou falls hard for Jackie, an ambitious bodybuilder headed through town to Vegas in pursuit of her dream. But their love ignites violence, pulling them deep into the web of Lou's criminal family.

name: One Life
summary: The true story of Nicholas Winston who helped save 669 children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

name: Prey [2024]
summary: After an extremist militant group threatens their lives, a young couple (Ryan Phillippe and Mena Suvari) is forced to flee their Christian missionary post in the Kalahari Desert.

name: Snack Shack
summary: Set in 1991, Snack Shack, follows best friends AJ (Conor Sherry) and Moose (Gabriel LaBelle) who seize the opportunity to run the local pool's rundown snack shack after their plan to gamble on dog races and sell home-brewed beer goes down the drain.

name: State of Consciousness
summary: Where do you turn when your nightmares become reality? Stephen and Alicia are a happy young couple living a simple life until Stephen is accused of a mysterious murder.

name: The Animal Kingdom
summary: In The Animal Kingdom, humans have begun to transform into unusual, hybrid creatures.

name: The Bloody Hundredth
summary: Directed by Mark Herzog and long-time Spielberg collaborator Laurent Bouzereau, the hour-long documentary spotlights the true stories of several characters and real-life airmen featured in "Masters of the Air."

name: The Neon Highway
summary: Beau Bridges stars as a drunken has-been country music legend who takes a chance to help a young singer make it big in Nashville.

name: The Throwback
summary: A married couple, deep in the trenches of a midlife crisis, find their world thrown into hilarious turmoil when the under-appreciated and stressed-out "supermom" suffers a post-traumatic breakdown, causing her to regress to her wild, college-age party-girl self.

name: Asleep in My Palm
summary: Asleep in My Palm explores the nature of parenthood and class in America as a father and daughter live off the grid in rural Ohio near a small liberal arts college.

name: Bardejov
summary: In Bardejov, Rafuel Lowy, a rabbi and wine maker, attempts to save girls from Auschwitz.

name: Room 0
summary: After learning that her younger sister has a rare disease, a young woman makes the desperate decision to get the money for a life-saving procedure by any means necessary.

name: Christspiracy: The Spirituality Secret
summary: Christspiracy is an investigative documentary following Kip Andersen and Kameron Waters as they expose how influential religious leaders of all faiths, have overlooked or even promoted animal exploitation.

name: Road House [2024]
summary: A former MMA fighter ends up working at a rowdy bar in the Florida Keys in this remake of the Patrick Swayze classic film.

name: Carol Doda Topless At The Condor
summary: The documentary feature Carol Doda Topless at the Condor tells the story of the fresh-faced girl next door who defied convention and the law by gyrating atop a white baby grand piano and turning a North Beach nightclub into the city's second-most-popular tourist attraction after the Golden Gate Bridge.

name: Femme
summary: Femme follows Jules, one of London's most celebrated drag artists, who gets attacked and withdraws from the outside world, traumatized.

name: Free Time
summary: Drew is approaching the end of his twenties and, with it, his relative youth. Looking to make a sudden change, he decides to quit his cushy desk job and "embrace life." Cycling quickly through friends, hobbies, and goals, it's not long until Drew realizes he has no idea what to do with his newfound freedom.

name: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
summary: In Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire, the Spengler family returns to where it all started – the iconic New York City firehouse – to team up with the original Ghostbusters, who’ve developed a top-secret research lab to take busting ghosts to the next level. But when the discovery of an ancient artifact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must join forces to protect their home and save the world from a second Ice Age.

name: Immaculate
summary: A woman of devout faith moves into a picture-perfect Italian convent, only to realize her new home harbors dark secrets.

name: Late Night with the Devil
summary: A floundering '70s talk-show host (David Dastmalchian) goes to extreme lengths to pull his ratings out of the toilet with a special Halloween episode.

name: Riddle of Fire
summary: Riddle of Fire follows three mischievous children as they embark on an odyssey when their mother asks them to run an errand. On the hunt to obtain her favorite blueberry pie, the children are kidnapped by poachers, battle a witch, outwit a huntsman, befriend a fairy, and bond together to become best friends forever.

name: The American Society of Magical Negroes
summary: The American Society of Magical Negroes is a satirical comedy about a young man, Aren, who is recruited into a secret society of magical Black people who dedicate their lives to a cause of utmost importance: making white people's lives easier.

name: You Can Call Me Bill
summary: You Can Call Me Bill is an intimate portrayal of the on-screen life of actor William (Bill) Shatner, most famous for his work in the Star Trek TV and film franchise.

name: You'll Never Find Me
summary: As a savage storm approaches a desolate caravan park, the solitary souls begin to feel threatened - but the storm may not be the only threat.

name: Craig Before the Creek
summary: Discover the origin story of the Creek's greatest explorer trio - Craig, JP, and Kelsey - and in a way we’ve never seen them before.

name: Easter Bloody Easter
summary: In a small Texas town, a series of bloody murders has the locals on edge for the upcoming "Easter-palooza". Jeanie wakes to find her husband is missing, and his wrecked car covered in blood and fur. Sam, the town's conspiracy theorist steers Jeanie and her best friend Carol, to the legend of the killer Jackalope that ravaged the town 150 years ago.

name: Snow Valley
summary: A newly engaged couple's swank ski weekend goes horribly awry, when an unexpected guest arrives and the house's dark supernatural forces begin to rise on the anniversary of a tragic event.

name: The Oath
summary: 400 A.D., in a forgotten time of Ancient America, a lone Hebraic fugitive must preserve the history of his fallen nation while being hunted by a ruthless tyrant but rescuing the King's abused mistress could awaken a warrior's past.

name: Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey 2
summary: Deep within the 100-Acre-Wood, a destructive rage grows as Winnie-the-Pooh, Piglet, Owl, and Tigger find their home and their lives endangered after Christopher Robin revealed their existence.

name: Asphalt City
summary: Asphalt City follows Ollie Cross (Tye Sheridan), a young paramedic assigned to the NYC night shift with an uncompromising and seasoned partner Gene Rutkovsky (Sean Penn).

name: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
summary: Godzilla x Kong delves further into the histories of these Titans, their origins, and the mysteries of Skull Island and beyond.

name: In the Land of Saints and Sinners
summary: Finbar Murphy (Liam Neeson) is drawn into a vicious game of cat and mouse when a menacing crew of terrorists arrive in his remote Irish coastal town.

name: La Chimera
summary: In an adventurous journey between the living and the dead, between forests and cities, between celebrations and solitudes, the intertwined destinies of these archaeologists unfold, all in search of the Chimera.

name: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel Foley
summary: Detective Axel Foley (Eddie Murphy) is back on the beat in Beverly Hills. After his daughter’s life is threatened, she (Taylour Paige) and Foley team up with a new partner (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) and old pals Billy Rosewood (Judge Reinhold) and John Taggart (John Ashton) to turn up the heat and uncover a conspiracy.

name: Legend of the White Dragon
summary: In the Aftermath, the city was left decimated. A past reminder of the great battle and fall of heroes. The heroes were blamed, stripped of their titles, and hunted.

name: Mars Express
summary: In 2200, private detective Aline Ruby and her android partner Carlos Rivera are hired by a wealthy businessman to track down a notorious hacker.

name: Salem's Lot [Remake]
summary: Author Ben Mears returns to his hometown for inspiration, only to discover the town is being preyed upon by a bloodthirsty vampire.

name: The Concierge
summary: Akino is a trainee concierge at the Hokkyoku Department Store, an unusual department store that caters exclusively to animals. Under the watchful eyes of the floor manager and senior concierges, Akino runs around to fulfill the wishes of customers with a myriad of needs and problems in her pursuit to become a full-fledged concierge.

name: The Witcher: Sirens of the Deep
summary: This is the second animated movie based on The Witcher, Polish author Andrzej Sapkowski's fantasy book series which inspired a blockbuster video game franchise and the Netflix series.

name: This is Spinal Tap 2
summary: Could this one go past 11? The band will crank it up in this 40th anniversary sequel to the critically-acclaimed and much-adored 1984 mockumentary This Is Spinal Tap.

name: Wallace & Gromit 2
summary: Wallace's newest invention threatens the safety and well being of everyone around him.

name: Dagr
summary: Fame-seeking Youtubers pose as caterers and they travel to an 18th century house where a glossy advert for a fashion brand is being shot. They plan on stealing from the production but they unwittingly step into a haunted house, plagued by a demonic druid.

name: Mister Sleep
summary: A deranged serial killer called Mister Sleep, survives prison execution and is reborn as a terrifying and unstoppable force of nature who unleashes savage and bloody revenge on a group of insomnia patients participating in a new drug trial.

name: Musica
summary: Based on writer, director and star Rudy Mancuso, Música is a coming-of-age love story that follows an aspiring creator with synesthesia, who must come to terms with an uncertain future, while navigating the pressures of love, family and his Brazilian culture in Newark, New Jersey.

name: A Bit of Light
summary: Ella (Anna Paquin), at almost forty years old, is forced to move back in with her father and has given up custody of her young daughters to her ex-husband Joseph and his new partner Bethan, though she hopes this change won't be permanent.

name: Baghead [2023]
summary: A young woman inherits a run-down pub and discovers a dark secret within its basement - a shape-shifting creature that can transform into the dead.

name: Coup de Chance
summary: Coup de Chance is about the important role chance and luck play in our lives.

name: Girls State
summary: Girls State follows young female leaders - from wildly different backgrounds across Missouri - as they navigate an immersive experiment to build a government from the ground up.

name: Monkey Man
summary: Dev Patel stars in this action thriller which has been described as "John Wick in Mumbai."

name: Parachute
summary: A once-promising musician falls for a fun and energetic young woman who struggles with an eating disorder and body image issues.

name: The Antisocial Network: Memes to Mayhem
summary: From the rise of QAnon to the January 6th riots, The Antisocial Network: Memes to Mayhem explains how a group of bored teenagers built an online community out of their shared loneliness but accidentally shattered consensus reality in the process.

name: The Beast [2023]
summary: Set in 2044, The Beast, explores a world where AI controls all facets of a stoic society as humans routinely "erase" their feelings.

name: The First Omen
summary: When a young American woman is sent to Rome to begin a life of service to the church, she encounters a darkness that causes her to question her own faith and uncovers a terrifying conspiracy that hopes to bring about the birth of evil incarnate.

name: The Greatest Hits
summary: Harriet (Lucy Boynton) finds art imitating life when she discovers certain songs can transport her back in time - literally. While she relives the past through romantic memories of her former boyfriend (David Corenswet), her time traveling collides with a burgeoning new love interest in the present (Justin H. Min).

name: The People's Joker
summary: A painfully unfunny aspiring clown (Vera Drew as Joker the Harlequin) grapples with her gender identity while unsuccessfully attempting to join the ranks of Gotham City's sole comedy program in a world where comedy has been outlawed.

name: Wicked Little Letters
summary: When people in Littlehampton begin to receive letters full of hilarious profanities, rowdy Irish migrant Rose is charged with the crime. Suspecting something is amiss, the town's women investigate.

name: Wes is Dying
summary: After finding out their best friend Wes is dying, filmmakers Parker and Devin realize they can use this opportunity to make an award-winning documentary that will finally help them make it big in Hollywood.

name: All You Need is Death
summary: The feature debut of Dublin-based writer/director Paul Duane, All You Need is Death tells the story of a young couple who are part of a mysterious, secret organization that travels at night with the desire to discover forbidden knowledge.

name: Arcadian
summary: In a near future, normal life on Earth has been decimated. Paul and his two sons, Thomas and Joseph, have been living a half-life – tranquility by day and torment by night. Every night, after the sun sets, they face the unrelenting attacks of a mysterious and violent evil.

name: Civil War
summary: Kirsten Dunst, Wagner Moura, Stephen McKinley Henderson, and Cailee Spaeny star in this feature film from director Alex Garland.

name: Coup de Chance
summary: Coup de Chance is about the important role chance and luck play in our lives.

name: Damaged
summary: Damaged follows Dan Lawson (Samuel L. Jackson), a Chicago detective, who travels to Scotland to investigate a serial killer with possible connections to Chicago.

name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead [2024]
summary: Seventeen-year-old Tanya Crandell (Simone Joy Jones) gets stuck taking care of her siblings when her elderly babysitter drops dead.

name: Lost Angel: The Genius of Judee Sill
summary: An intimate portrait of a one-of-a-kind singer-songwriter from 1970s Los Angeles, the documentary charts the life of Judee Sill from a troubled adolescence that included armed robbery and prison through her meteoric rise in the music world and tragic early death.

name: Sasquatch Sunset
summary: In the misty forests of North America, a family of Sasquatches - possibly the last of their enigmatic kind - embark on an absurdist, epic, hilarious, and ultimately poignant journey over the course of one year.

name: Sting
summary: Sting spins a web of thrilling terror when 12-year-old Charlotte's pet spider rapidly transforms into a giant flesh-eating monster, forcing the young girl to fight for her family's survival.

name: The Greatest Hits
summary: Harriet (Lucy Boynton) finds art imitating life when she discovers certain songs can transport her back in time - literally. While she relives the past through romantic memories of her former boyfriend (David Corenswet), her time traveling collides with a burgeoning new love interest in the present (Justin H. Min).

name: The Long Game
summary: Experience the inspiring journey of young caddies who dared to dream beyond the fairways.

name: Irena's Vow
summary: Through the eyes of a strong-willed woman comes the remarkable true story of Irena Gut Opdyke and the triumphs of the human spirit over devastating tragedy.

name: Abigail
summary: A group of kidnappers take a 12-year-old ballerina only to eventually realize she's no ordinary girl.

name: Blood For Dust
summary: Former friends go into business together moving guns and drugs in an effort to make some quick cash.

name: Dusk for a Hitman
summary: Hitman, Donald Lavoie faces an impossible order: eliminate his own family for mob boss Claude Dubois. Detectives offer him a way out by making him their informant, putting Donald in a perilous balancing act between loyalty and survival.

name: Hard Miles
summary: A strong-willed social worker at a youth facility assembles an unlikely cycling team of juvenile convicts and takes them on a transformative 1000-mile bike ride.

name: Late Night with the Devil
summary: A floundering '70s talk-show host (David Dastmalchian) goes to extreme lengths to pull his ratings out of the toilet with a special Halloween episode.

name: Rebel Moon Part 2: The Scargiver
summary: Rebel Moon - Part Two: The Scargiver continues the epic saga of Kora and the surviving warriors as they prepare to sacrifice everything, fighting alongside the brave people of Veldt, to defend a once peaceful village, a newfound homeland for those who have lost their own in the fight against the Motherworld.

name: SPY x FAMILY CODE: White
summary: He's a spy. She's an assassin. Together, Loid and Yor keep their double lives to themselves while pretending to be the perfect family. However, their adopted daughter Anya, a telepath, knows both of their exciting secrets unbeknownst to them.

name: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
summary: Based upon recently declassified files of the British War Department and inspired by true events, The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare is an action-comedy that tells the story of the first-ever special forces organization formed during WWII by UK Prime Minister Winston Churchill.

name: The Three Musketeers - Part II: Milady
summary: From the Louvre to Buckingham Palace, to the gutters of Paris to the siege of LaRochelle… In a kingdom divided by religious wars and under threat of British invasion, a handful of men and women will battle and tie their fate to that of France.

name: Justice League: Crisis on Infinite Earths, Part Two
summary: An endless army of SHADOW DEMONS bent on the destruction of all reality swarms over our world and all parallel Earths! The only thing opposing them is the mightiest team of metahumans ever assembled.

name: La Cha Cha
summary: Solti discovers La Cha Cha, a closed holiday park with a vibrant retiree community led by feisty owner Libby and her brother Damien.

name: Something You Said Last Night
summary: Ren, an aspiring writer and mid-twenty-something, accompanies her parents, Mona and Guido, and her younger sister, Siena, on a beach resort holiday in cottage country. As Ren navigates the resort, she struggles to cope with her parents' loving yet overbearing nature, and tries to balance the yearning for independence with the comfort of being taken care of.

name: Bloodline Killer
summary: Bloodline Killer is a horror-thriller that follows Moira Cole who endeavors to rebuild her shattered life after the murder of her family at the hands of her deranged and obsessed cousin.

name: Boy Kills World
summary: Bill Skarsgård stars as Boy, a deaf-mute with a vivid imagination, driven by his inner voice, one which he co-opted from his favorite childhood video game, avows revenge after his family is murdered by Hilda Van Der Koy (Famke Janssen).

name: Break [2024]
summary: Eli learns that his father was a Detroit pool hall legend. As he journeys into the scene, he's forced to confront the realities and danger of the game - and himself.

name: Breathe [2024]
summary: After Earth is left uninhabitable due to lack of oxygen, a mother Maya (Jennifer Hudson) and her daughter Zora (Quvenzhané Wallis) are forced to live underground, with short trips to the surface only made possible by a coveted state of the art oxygen suit.

name: Cash Out
summary: John Travolta plays a criminal mastermind looking to pull one last heist before retiring.

name: Challengers
summary: Challengers stars Zendaya as Tashi Duncan, a former tennis prodigy turned coach and a force of nature who makes no apologies for her game on and off the court.

name: Cinderella's Revenge
summary: Cinderella's wicked stepsisters and stepmother push her too far, leading her to swap her glass slippers in pursuit of blood-soaked vengeance with the help of her Fairy Godmother.

name: Humane
summary: Humane takes place over a single day, mere months after a global ecological collapse has forced world leaders to take extreme measures to reduce the earth's population.

name: Infested
summary: A young man's fascinating with creatures turns deadly when be brings home a quickly-reproducing spider which escapes and turns his apartment building into a dangerous trap.

name: Unsung Hero
summary: Based on a true story, Unsung Hero follows David Smallbone as he moves his family from Down Under to the States, searching for a brighter future after his successful music company collapses.

name: Impulse [2024]
summary: Sofia (Dajana Gudic), a journalist eager to make her mark, but consumed by conspiracy theories. As she connects a couple of seemingly isolated high-profile deaths, she is pulled into the orbit of Zane (Nick Cassavetes), the mercurial leader of a global cabal that counts media moguls (Paul Johansson), politicians (Rob Kirkland) and Hollywood elites amongst its members.

name: My Divorce Party
summary: Divorcee Xan gathers her close friends to celebrate her impending split, only to reveal she intends to burn her divorce settlement money to start fresh. Chaos ensues as each friend has a wildly different opinion on what Xan should do.

name: Witch
summary: Small town, England. 1575. William embarks on a journey to prove the innocence of his wife, Twyla, falsely accused of being a witch.

name: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel Foley
summary: Detective Axel Foley (Eddie Murphy) is back on the beat in Beverly Hills. After his daughter’s life is threatened, she (Taylour Paige) and Foley team up with a new partner (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) and old pals Billy Rosewood (Judge Reinhold) and John Taggart (John Ashton) to turn up the heat and uncover a conspiracy.

name: Legend of the White Dragon

summary: In 2200, private detective Aline Ruby and her android partner Carlos Rivera are hired by a wealthy businessman to track down a notorious hacker.

name: Salem's Lot [Remake]
summary: Author Ben Mears returns to his hometown for inspiration, only to discover the town is being preyed upon by a bloodthirsty vampire.

name: The Concierge
summary: Akino is a trainee concierge at the Hokkyoku Department Store, an unusual department store that caters exclusively to animals. summary: This is the second animated movie based on The Witcher, Polish author Andrzej Sapkowski's fantasy book series which inspired a blockbuster video game franchise and the Netflix series.

name: This is Spinal Tap 2
summary: Could this one go past 11? The band will crank it up in this 40th anniversary sequel to the critically-acclaimed and much-adored 1984 mockumentary This Is Spinal Tap.

name: Wallace & Gromit 2
summary: Wallace's newest invention threatens the safety and well being of everyone around him.

name: Jeanne du Barry
summary: Jeanne du Barry follows Jeanne Vaubernier (Maïwenn), a working-class woman determined to climb the social ladder, using her charms to escape her impoverished life.

name: The Idea of You
summary: Based on the acclaimed, contemporary love story of the same name, The Idea of You centers on Solène (Anne Hathaway), a 40-year-old single mom who begins an unexpected romance with 24-year-old Hayes Campbell (Nicholas Galitzine), the lead singer of August Moon, the hottest boy band on the planet.

name: Evil Does Not Exist
summary: Locals become upset when a company's plans to build a "glamping site" which could have a negative impact on the local water supply.

name: I Saw the TV Glow
summary: Teenager Owen is just trying to make it through life in the suburbs when his classmate introduces him to a mysterious late-night TV show - a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

name: Lost Soulz
summary: When aspiring rapper Sol is discovered by a group of Gen-Z musicians after performing at a house party, he joins their tour through the heart of Texas and embarks on a once-in-a-lifetime road trip.

name: New Life
summary: A mysterious woman is hunted down by a resourceful fixer sent by the CDC, and the stakes of the pursuit rise to apocalyptic proportions.

name: The Fall Guy
summary: Ryan Gosling stars as Colt Seavers, a battle-scarred stuntman who, having left the business a year earlier to focus on both his physical and mental health, is drafted back into service when the star of a mega-budget studio movie - being directed by his ex, Jody Moreno (Emily Blut) - goes missing.

name: Unfrosted: The Pop-Tart Story
summary: Jerry Seinfeld stars in and directs this comedy about the creation of the Pop Tart. The film is based on a joke he made in his standup comedy.

name: Red vs. Blue: Restoration
summary: When the universe's greatest villain returns in a terrifying new form, old adversaries, the Reds and Blues of Blood Gulch, will have to set aside their differences to save the galaxy one last time. Red vs. Blue: Restoration is the 19th and final season of the Red vs. Blue TV series and is released as a feature film.

name: Force of Nature: The Dry 2
summary: After receiving a distressing call from an informant, Federal Agents Aaron Falk and Carmen Cooper head deep into the Giralang Ranges to investigate the whereabouts of their corporate whistle-blower Alice after she mysteriously disappears on a company hiking retreat.

name: Horrorscope
summary: After getting their horoscopes read, a group of college friends begin dying in ways connected to their fortunes. Are their fates fatal or can they change what's written in the stars?

name: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
summary: As a new tyrannical ape leader builds his empire, one young ape undertakes a harrowing journey that will cause him to question all that he has known about the past and to make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

name: Lazareth
summary: Following the death of their parents, Lee (Ashley Judd) adopts her nieces, Imogen (Katie Douglas) and Maeve (Sarah Pidgeon), and raises them in a remote cabin as a deadly pandemic rages on around them. Their safety becomes threatened when they discover an injured man in the nearby woods.

name: My Ex-Friend's Wedding
summary: When four childhood best friends get a drunken voicemail from their former best friend on the eve of her wedding day - confessing that she thinks she's making a mistake - they set out to stop her wedding and rekindle the friendship they once shared.

name: Poolman
summary: Poolman tells the story of Darren Barrenman (Chris Pine), a native Los Angeleno who spends his days looking after the pool of the Tahitian Tiki apartment block and fighting to make his hometown a better place to live.

name: Tarot
summary: When a group of friends recklessly violates the sacred rule of Tarot readings – never use someone else’s deck – they unknowingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within the cursed cards.

name: The Image of You
summary: Identical twins Anna and Zoe find their bond tested over Anna's new love, Nick. While the trusting Anna is head over heels, her skeptical sister Zoe senses a web of deceit. But as Zoe digs for the truth, they're all pulled into a dangerous game where honesty could prove fatal.

name: The Last Stop in Yuma County
summary: While awaiting the next fuel truck at a middle-of-nowhere Arizona rest stop, a traveling young knife salesman is thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two similarly stranded bank robbers with no qualms about using cruelty - or cold, hard steel - to protect their bloodstained, ill-begotten fortune.

name: We Grown Now
summary: In 1992 Chicago, as Michael Jordan solidifies himself as a champion, a story of two young legends in their own right begins.

name: Babes
summary: Babes follows inseparable childhood best friends Eden and Dawn, having grown up together in NYC, now firmly in different phases of adulthood. When carefree and single Eden decides to have a baby on her own after a one-night stand, their friendship faces its greatest challenge.

name: Back to Black
summary: Back to Black is a never-before-seen glimpse into Amy Winehouse's early rise to fame and the release of her groundbreaking studio album, Back to Black.

name: IF [2024]
summary: This family movie is written and directed by John Krasinski. It stars Ryan Reynolds, John Krasinski, Cailey Fleming, Fiona Shaw, Phoebe Waller-Bridge, Louis Gossett Jr., Alan Kim, Liza Colón-Zayas and Steve Carell.

name: Nightwatch: Demons Are Forever
summary: 22-year-old medical student Emma (Fanny Leander Bornedal) tries to get to the bottom of what really happened to her parents.

name: The Blue Angels
summary: The Blue Angels showcases Navy's elite Flight Demonstration Squadron in this documentary which puts you in the cockpit for a firsthand view of the Blue Angels' precision flying, while the aerial shots deliver a spectacular showcase of the breathtaking maneuvers that have made them the world's premier jet team.

name: The Strangers: Chapter 1
summary: Madelaine Petsch stars as a young woman starting a new life with her fiancé. Suddenly, during a road trip stop in a remote vacation rental in the woods, they become the prey of a mysterious gang of masked strangers.

name: Darkness of Man
summary: Russell Hatch (Jean Claude Van Damme) is a washed up, former Interpol operative who vowed to protect the son of an informant killed years earlier in a raid gone wrong. When merciless street gangs start an all-out turf war and the kid is caught in the middle, Hatch will stop at nothing to keep him safe and fight anyone who gets in his way.

name: The Blue Angels
summary: The Blue Angels showcases Navy's elite Flight Demonstration Squadron in this documentary which puts you in the cockpit for a firsthand view of the Blue Angels' precision flying, while the aerial shots deliver a spectacular showcase of the breathtaking maneuvers that have made them the world's premier jet team.

name: Mad Max: Furiosa
summary: Mad Max: Furiosa is a prequel to the Mad Max franchise by series mastermind George Miller.

name: The Garfield Movie
summary: Garfield (voiced by Chris Pratt), the world-famous, Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, is about to have a wild outdoor adventure! After an unexpected reunion with his long-lost father – scruffy street cat Vic (voiced by Samuel L. Jackson) – Garfield and his canine friend Odie are forced from their perfectly pampered life into joining Vic in a hilarious, high-stakes heist.

name: In a Violent Nature
summary: When a locket is removed from a collapsed fire tower in the woods that entombs the rotting corpse of Johnny, a vengeful spirit spurred on by a horrific 60-year old crime, his body is resurrected and becomes hellbent on retrieving it.

name: Stopmotion
summary: A stop-motion animator struggles to control her demons after the loss of her overbearing mother.

name: The Crow [2024]
summary: Soulmates Eric Draven (Bill Skarsgård) and Shelly Webster (FKA twigs) are brutally murdered when the demons of her dark past catch up with them. Given the chance to save his true love by sacrificing himself, Eric sets out to seek merciless revenge on their killers, traversing the worlds of the living and the dead to put the wrong things right.

name: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
summary: The fourth installment of the Will Smith / Martin Lawrence buddy cop action/comedy series.

name: Break [2024]
summary: Eli learns that his father was a Detroit pool hall legend. As he journeys into the scene, he's forced to confront the realities and danger of the game - and himself.

name: Inside Out 2
summary: Inside Out 2 continues to take us inside the mind of Riley, now a teenager conjuring an entirely new range of emotions.

name: The Watchers
summary: A young artist and three strangers become stranded in a dense forest in western Ireland. Unable to reach help, they find themselves stalked by mysterious creatures. Ishana Night Shyamalan's directorial debut.

name: Ultraman: Rising
summary: When baseball superstar Ken Sato returns home to Japan to pick up the mantle of Earth-defending superhero Ultraman, he quickly finds more than he bargained for as he's forced to raise the offspring of his greatest foe.

name: It Ends With Us
summary: Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni star in this feature film adaptation of Colleen Hoover's novel about a young woman who is trying to figure out life after college.

name: Kinds of Kindness
summary: Kinds of Kindness is a triptych fable, following a man without choice who tries to take control of his own life; a policeman who is alarmed that his wife who was missing-at-sea has returned and seems a different person; and a woman determined to find a specific someone with a special ability, who is destined to become a prodigious spiritual leader.

name: The Bikeriders
summary: The Bikeriders is a furious drama following the rise of a fictional 1960s Midwestern motorcycle club through the lives of its members.

name: Thelma [2024]
summary: June Squibb stars as Thelma Post, a feisty 93-year-old grandmother who gets conned by a phone scammer pretending to be her grandson (Fred Hechinger) and sets out on a treacherous quest across Los Angeles, accompanied by an aging friend (Richard Roundtree) and his motorized scooter, to reclaim what was taken from her.

name: A Quiet Place: Day One
summary: Experience the day the world went quiet.

name: Daddio
summary: A woman (Dakota Johnson) taking a cab ride from JFK engages in a conversation with the taxi driver (Sean Penn) about the important relationships in their lives.
